text: `Next thing ${pick} knows`
`${pick} is put up in a bunk bed`
`looking at the ceiling. ${pick} touches the ceiling with hands`
`first time feeling trapped inside`
`digital alarm starts ringing. pitch is getting higher and higher`
`walks down the ladder to turn off the alarm`
`${pick}looks through clothes in suitcase and pick an outfit`
`goes to orientation and meets with other students who are also new to school and states`
`${pick} is in 7th grade`
`in this new place, new environment, new house`
`${pick} must get along with others and make this place home`
`thrown into this new world`
`${pick} might like it`
`${pick} might love it`
`${pick} might hate it`
`because ${pick} is now part of the community, ${pick} is required to do anything the school asks for`
`${pick} is not alone,`
`but definitely feels alone`
`the white wooden fence keeps ${pick} inside the school`
`its everywhere`
`fences are not tall, but they have sharp, pointy top`
`Someone asks, do you translate when you hear English? Or do you understand it right away?`
`${pick} says, ‘I don’t know’`
`one asks again, well then do you think in English or in Korean?`
`And ${pick} replies, I just speak English`
`${pick} thinks, - maybe not perfect english -`
`${pick} goes to American history class`
`${pick} has a quiz today`
`the quiz is on the current event that was discussed during class`
`fails it miserably`
`${pick} doesn’t know what to tell to parents because everyone else seems to be doing fine`
`maybe ${pick} is not the brightest kid afterall`
`It’s a break time`
`${pick} sees other kids going outside. ${pick} looks out the window from the second floor. `
`${pick}'s never seen a grass field large as this`
`${pick} thinks -i will stick out even more if i go out there -`
`other kids are playing touch football and basketball on mini hoop.`
`as of now, ${pick} doesn’t have a friend to talk to during a break.`
`${pick} is not sure what to do, but just stare out the window. And ${pick} wonders what are the rules for football`
`people think ${pick} is a very shy kid`
`${pick} is shy because ${pick} doesn’t know what to say to others and how to approach to others.`
